resources.name: crop_data

fields.name: site
fields.title: Site
fields.description: Rothamsted or Woburn

fields.name: plot
fields.title: Plot
fields.description: Plot number.  1-32 at Rothamsted, 33-64 at Woburn

fields.name: block
fields.title: Block
fields.description: Block number 1 or 2

fields.name: sub-plot
fields.title: Sub-plot
fields.description: All plots divided into two sub-plots in 1974-1980 to test Mg,  and again to test Mn (1987-1990) and S (1991-1996). There are no sub-plots in the other years.

fields.name: harvest_year
fields.title: Year in which crop harvested
fields.description: Year crop harvested. It may have been sown the previous autumn, if it is a winter crop.

fields.name: liming_factor_level
fields.title: Lime treatment
fields.description: The four different lime treatments applied

fields.name: lime_date
fields.title: Date lime applied
fields.description: Date lime applied

fields.name: annual_lime
fields.title: Annual lime application in this harvest year
fields.description: Actual amount of lime applied in the current harvest year. Applied five or six times between March 1962- November 1986

fields.name: cumulative_lime
fields.title: Total cumulative lime application by this harvest year
fields.description: Cumulative sum of total amount of lime applied up to the current harvest year. Applied five or six times between March 1962- November 1986

fields.name: p_factor_level
fields.title: P treatment between 1962 and 1980 (period 1), and 1981-1996 (period 2)
fields.description: The different phosphorus treatments applied 1962-1980, and 1981-1996

fields.name: p_rate_annual
fields.title: Amount of fertilizer P applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Amount of phosphorus treatment applied in this harvest year. Applied each year 1962-1980 except 1969, 1979-1980. In 1981-1996 only applied 1981, 1982, 1983 and 1988

fields.name: p_rate_cumulative
fields.title: Cumulative amount of P applied up to that harvest year
fields.description: Cumulative total amount of phosphorus treatment applied up to this harvest year. Applied each year 1962-1980 except 1969, 1979-1980. In 1981-1996 only applied 1981, 1982, 1983 and 1988

fields.name: k_factor_level
fields.title: K treatment between 1962 and 1980
fields.description: Whether potassium treatment is applied or not, 1962-1980

fields.name: k_rate_annual
fields.title: Amount of fertilizer K applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Amount of potassium treatment applied in this harvest year. Applied 1962-1980 only. Basal fertilizer K applied to all plots from 1981, see K_basal_rate

fields.name: mg_factor_level
fields.title: Mg treatment between 1974 and 1978
fields.description: Whether magnesium treatment is applied or not, 1974-1978

fields.name: mg_rate_annual
fields.title: Amount of fertilizer Mg applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Amount of magnesium treatment applied in this harvest year. Applied 1974, 1976-1978 only. Basal fertilizer Mg applied to all plots from 1981, see Mg_basal_rate

fields.name: mn_factor_level
fields.title: Mn treatment between 1987 and 1990
fields.description: Whether foliar manganese treatment is applied or not, 1987-1990

fields.name: mn_rate_annual
fields.title: Amount of foliar fertilizer Mn applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Amount of foliar manganese treatment applied in this harvest year. Applied 1987-1990 only, see note 4

fields.name: s_factor_level
fields.title: S treatment between 1991 and 1996
fields.description: Whether sulfur treatment is applied or not, 1991-1996

fields.name: s_rate_annual
fields.title: Amount of fertilizer S applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Amount of sulfur treatment applied in this harvest year. Applied 1991-1996 only

fields.name: n_basal_rate
fields.title: Amount of basal fertilizer N applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Basal fertilizer N applied in this harvest year, to all plots. Amount depends on crop type. This is not a treatment. Applied all years 1962-1996, except to legumes, fallow or failed crops.

fields.name: k_basal_rate
fields.title: Amount of basal fertilizer K applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Basal fertilizer K applied in this harvest year, to all plots. Amount depends on crop type. This is not a treatment. Applied 1981-1996 only, but not all years.

fields.name: mg_basal_rate
fields.title: Amount of basal fertilizer Mg applied in that harvest year
fields.description: Basal fertilizer Mg applied in this harvest year, to all plots. Amount depends on crop type. This is not a treatment. Applied 1981-1996 only, but not all years.

fields.name: crop
fields.title: Crop type grown
fields.description: Name of crop grown in this harvest year

fields.name: variety
fields.title: Crop variety
fields.description: Crop variety or cultivar. Not present in fallow years: 1969, 1979, 1980, 1984

fields.name: sow_date
fields.title: Sowing date
fields.description: Date crop sown or planted. Not present in fallow years: 1969, 1979, 1980, 1984

fields.name: harvest_date
fields.title: Harvest date
fields.description: Date crop harvested. Not present in fallow years: 1969, 1979, 1980, 1984, or yields when crops failed, shown as note 2

fields.name: yield
fields.title: Crop yield
fields.description: Yield of harvested produce (grain and tubers) at usual % dry matter, see next column, except potato tubers which are at fresh weight. Not present in fallow years: 1969, 1979, 1980, 1984, or yields when crops failed, shown as note 2

fields.name: %_dry_matter
fields.title: Percentage dry matter
fields.description: Percent dry matter of harvested produce; cereals and beans 85%, oilseeds, lupins and linseed 90%. Potato tubers fresh weight, % dry matter not recorded. Not present in fallow years: 1969, 1979, 1980, 1984, or yields when crops failed, shown as note 2, or for potatoes see note 5

fields.name: note
fields.title: Note
fields.description: Whether notes are applied or not

resources.title: Crop yield data
resources.description: The main data table containing crop yield data for all plots and all treatments, 1962-1996. Includes details of all lime and fertilizer treatments applied, basal fertilizers and agronomic dates. For lime and P treatments we provide the annual and cumulative amounts applied to each plot, as these vary from year to year.

resources.description: List of crops grown with Latin names and AGROVOC concepts.

Refer to the crop_data table for the actual amounts applied to each plot.

name: rothamsted-long-term-liming-experiment-crop-yields-1962-1996
title: Rothamsted long-term liming experiment crop yields 1962-1996
description:
### Abstract
The experiment tests the effects of different amounts of lime (and thus soil pH), P and K on the yields of a sequence of arable crops, on a silty clay loam soil at Rothamsted Experimental Farm, from 1962-1996. Mg, Mn and S were tested on split plots at different times. Target soil pH was 4.5, 5.5, 6.5 and 7.5. The dataset contains plot and sub-plot yields for all plots and years, 1962-1996, details of all treatments applied (lime, P, K, Mg, Mn and S), and agronomic details (crop variety, sowing and harvest date, basal fertilizer). 

There was a parallel experiment at Woburn Experimental Farm. This experiment was under grass from 1997-2019 and no treatments were applied. In April 2019 the experiment was revived, and is currently being used to investigate the effect of different lime, P and Zn treatments on macro and micro nutrient uptake of wheat varieties. For more details contact Dr SM Haefele.
### Methods
Period 1 (1962-1980): four lime levels with and without fertilizer P and K. Magnesium was tested on split plots 1974-1978. Period 2 (1981-1996): four lime levels with four P levels. Manganese was te sted on split plots 1987-1990; Sulphur was tested on split plots 1991-1996. 2 replicates.
### Technical Info

### Other

### Provenance
Information is taken from original raw data sheets and analysis files, held in the archives at Rothamsted Research, and the Annual Rothamsted Yield Books. Verification includes checking of original plot yield data with published mean data from the Rothamsted Yield Books.
### Quality
